entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, trying to avoid detection by Filch and Snape. (Excerpt: 'Harry stood rooted to the spot...')

entities.name: filch
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is tasked with maintaining discipline. (Excerpt: 'Filch and Snape came around the corner ahead.')

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A potions master at Hogwarts who is known for being strict and intimidating. (Excerpt: 'Filch and Snape came around the corner ahead.')

entities.name: cloak
entities.description: An object that Harry is wearing, which allows him to become invisible. (Excerpt: 'The Cloak didn’t stop him being solid')

entities.name: door
entities.description: A door in the corridor that Harry uses to escape from Filch and Snape. (Excerpt: 'He squeezed through it, holding his breath...')

entities.name: room
entities.description: The room where Harry hides after escaping from Filch and Snape. (Excerpt: 'That had been close, very close. It was a few seconds before he noticed anything about the room he had hidden in.')

entities.name: classroom
entities.description: A disused classroom that Harry hides in. (Excerpt: 'It looked like a disused classroom...')
